channel.title: The "Loading extra files" Small Text on Client Login Screen
channel.description:
For anyone who didn't know (renamed client, 317. May be different for non renamed).
Client class:
[code=java] smallText.method382(0x75a9a9, c / 2, onDemandFetcher.statusString, i, true); [/code]
Change the:
[code=java] onDemandFetcher.statusString [/code]
To:
[code=java] "Client Version: 1.0" [/code]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/708/smalltext.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img708/9339/smalltext.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: The "Loading extra files" Small Text on Client Login Screen
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:6, topic:460472”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=563398.msg4110005#msg4110005 date=1348430199]

Why would you change it?

Because it looks better than “Loading extra files”.
[/quote]

Loading extra files only appears if you’re using OD CRC.[/quote]

Or when you’re using a cache from an earlier date than the client iirc

Read full topic
item.source: The "Loading extra files" Small Text on Client Login Screen
